kpi_info.title: PCH TO CELL_FACH ATTEMPTS
kpi_info.use: The number of attempted state transitions from Cell_PCH or URA_PCH to Cell_FACH. UPDATED: When the UE is in Cell_PCH or URA_PCH state and the RNC receives RRC: CELL UPDATE message from the UE triggering transfer to Cell_FACH. The counter is not be updated if the Cell Update or URA Update triggers RRC connection release or going back to Cell_PCH or URA_PCH state.
